Rule.Filter: ([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and not [tunnel]='yes'
([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and not [tunnel]='yes'
[highway] = 'path' and not ([bicycle] = 'designated' or [foot] = 'designated' or [horse] = 'designated') and not [tunnel] = 'yes'

Datasource.Parameter: (select way,aeroway,amenity,landuse,leisure,man_made,military,"natural",power,tourism,name from %PREFIX%_polygon where landuse is not null or leisure is not null or aeroway in ('apron','aerodrome') or man_made='pier' or amenity in ('parking','university','college','school','hospital','grave_yard') or military in ('barracks','danger_area') or "natural" in ('field','beach','glacier','heath','mud','wood') or power in ('station','sub_station') or tourism in ('attraction','camp_site','caravan_site','picnic_site','zoo') order by z_order,way_area desc ) as leisure
(select way,leisure from %PREFIX%_polygon where leisure in ('sports_centre','stadium') order by z_order,way_area desc) as sports_grounds

(select way,"natural",waterway,landuse,name from %PREFIX%_polygon where waterway in ('dock','mill_pond','riverbank','canal') or landuse in ('reservoir','water') or "natural" in ('lake','water','land','marsh','scrub','wetland','glacier') order by z_order,way_area desc) as water_areas
(select way,waterway,disused,name,case when tunnel in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else tunnel end as tunnel from %PREFIX%_line where waterway IS NOT NULL order by z_order) as water_lines
(select way from %PREFIX%_line where man_made='pier') as piers

(select way,highway from %PREFIX%_line where highway in ('motorway','motorway_link','trunk','trunk_link','primary','primary_link','secondary','secondary_link','tertiary','residential','unclassified','minor') and tunnel in ('yes','true','1') order by z_order) as roads
(select way from %PREFIX%_point where highway='turning_circle') as turning_circle
(select way,highway,horse,foot,bicycle from %PREFIX%_line where highway in ('bridleway','footway','cycleway','path') and tunnel in ('yes','true','1') order by z_order) as roads
(select way,tracktype from %PREFIX%_line where highway='track' and (bridge is null or bridge in ('no','false','0')) and (tunnel is null or tunnel in ('no','false','0'))) as tracks
(select way,tracktype from %PREFIX%_line where highway='track' and tunnel in ('yes','true','1')) as tracks

(select way,building,leisure,railway,amenity,aeroway from %PREFIX%_polygon where building is not null or leisure in ('pitch','track') or railway='station' or amenity='place_of_worship' or aeroway='terminal' order by z_order,way_area desc) as buildings
(select way,barrier,"natural",man_made from %PREFIX%_line where barrier is not null or "natural" in ('hedge','cliff') or man_made='embankment') as roads
(select way,barrier,"natural" from %PREFIX%_polygon where barrier is not null or "natural"='hedge') as barriers
(select way,highway from %PREFIX%_polygon where highway in ('residential','unclassified','pedestrian','service','footway','track') order by z_order,way_area desc) as roads

(select way,highway,service, case when tunnel in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else tunnel end as tunnel from %PREFIX%_line where highway in ('motorway','motorway_link','trunk','trunk_link','primary','primary_link','secondary','secondary_link','tertiary','residential','unclassified','minor','road','service','pedestrian','raceway') order by z_order) as roads
(select way,highway from %PREFIX%_polygon where highway in ('residential','unclassified','pedestrian','service','footway','living_street','track') order by z_order,way_area desc) as roads

(select way,highway,horse,bicycle,foot,construction,railway,aeroway,service, case when tunnel in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else tunnel end as tunnel, case when bridge in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else bridge end as bridge from %PREFIX%_line where highway is not null or aeroway in ('runway','taxiway') or railway in ('light_rail','narrow_gauge','funicular','rail','subway','tram','spur','siding','platform') order by z_order) as roads
(select way from %PREFIX%_line where route='ferry' ) as routes
(select way,aerialway from %PREFIX%_line where aerialway is not null) as aerialways

(select way,highway,railway, case when tunnel in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else tunnel end as tunnel from %PREFIX%_roads where highway is not null or railway is not null order by z_order ) as roads
(select way,name from %PREFIX%_line where waterway='canal' and bridge in ('yes','true','1','aqueduct') order by z_order) as water

(select way,highway,aeroway,railway,layer,horse,bicycle,foot,bridge from %PREFIX%_line where (highway is not null or aeroway in ('runway','taxiway') or railway in ('light_rail','subway')) and bridge not in ('no','false','0') order by z_order ) as roads
(select way,tracktype from %PREFIX%_line where highway='track' and bridge in ('yes','true','1')) as tracks
(select way,access,highway from %PREFIX%_line where access is not null) as access
(select way from %PREFIX%_line where railway='tram' and (tunnel is null or tunnel not in ('yes','true','1'))) as trams
(select way,place,capital,name,ref from %PREFIX%_point where place is not null) as placenames

(select * from %PREFIX%_point where barrier IS NOT NULL or amenity IS NOT NULL or tourism is NOT NULL or railway is NOT NULL or "natural" is NOT NULL or highway is NOT NULL or aeroway is NOT NULL or aerialway is NOT NULL or power_source is NOT NULL or man_made is NOT NULL) as amenity

(select * from %PREFIX%_polygon where barrier IS NOT NULL or amenity IS NOT NULL or tourism is NOT NULL or railway is NOT NULL or "natural" is NOT NULL or highway is NOT NULL or aeroway is NOT NULL or aerialway is NOT NULL or power_source is NOT NULL or man_made is NOT NULL) as amenity
(select way from %PREFIX%_point where power='tower') as power_towers
(select way,case when oneway in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else oneway end as oneway from %PREFIX%_line where oneway is not null) as directions

Layer.name: planet roads text osm low zoom

Datasource.Parameter: (select way,highway,ref,char_length(ref) as length from %PREFIX%_roads where highway in ('motorway','trunk','primary') and ref is not null ) as roads

(select way,highway,aeroway,name,ref,char_length(ref) as length, case when bridge in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else bridge end as bridge from %PREFIX%_line where waterway IS NULL and leisure IS NULL and landuse IS NULL and (name is not null or ref is not null) ) as roads

(select way,amenity,highway,leisure,landuse,man_made,"natural",place,tourism,ele,name,ref,military,aeroway,'yes'::text as point from %PREFIX%_point where amenity is not null or leisure is not null or landuse is not null or tourism is not null or "natural" is not null or man_made='lighthouse' or place='island' or highway='motorway_junction' or military='danger_area' or aeroway='gate' ) as text

(select way,aeroway,amenity,highway,leisure,landuse,man_made,"natural",place,tourism,NULL as ele,name,ref,military,'no'::text as point from %PREFIX%_polygon where amenity is not null or leisure is not null or landuse is not null or tourism is not null or "natural" is not null or man_made='lighthouse' or place='island' or military='danger_area' ) as text
(select way,way_area,name from %PREFIX%_polygon where name is not null and (waterway is null or waterway <> 'riverbank') order by z_order,way_area desc ) as text
(select way from %PREFIX%_line where "addr:interpolation" is not null) as interpolation
(select way,"addr:housenumber" from %PREFIX%_polygon where "addr:housenumber" is not null and building is not null) as way_numbers
(select way,"addr:housenumber" from %PREFIX%_point where "addr:housenumber" is not null) as node_numbers
(select way,name from %PREFIX%_polygon where boundary='national_park') as boundary
